ygData.subject: Re: Yield Policy
ygData.msgSnippet: This is the most sensible alternative I have heard and seems quite reasonable. Nice job!! Pelom Sental, 33 lvl Cleric on Cazic-Thule ... item ... you ... not
ygData.messageBody:
This is the most sensible alternative I have heard and seems quite
reasonable.

Nice job!!


Pelom Sental, 33 lvl Cleric on Cazic-Thule

>From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
>
>What I think should be forced is not the fact if you are camping for an
item
>and you get no exp for the kill and me and my group comes along I shouldn't
>have the right to say "OK buddy move along" but it should be forced that
you
>have to share, you get your turn then me and my group, then you and then me
>and my group, etc.....
>So instade of getting banned for not yielding it should be banned after 3
>warnings of not sharing the spawn. I know thats what Mik and Mystix are
>saying that we should be able to share the spawn but how many ppl do you
>know that truely shares them? I've seen and heard about many players that
>would not share. But in away it should be "first come first served" but
not
>to the point of "We were here first, it's our camp now go away" it should
be
>they were there first they get the first shot at the spawn but once they
had
>their kill and no loot then it's back to the end of the line to let the
next
>person have a chance.
>But to me Brad needs to changing it from Yield Policy to Sharing Policy.
